52 
53 SimpleGraspBase::SimpleGraspBase(const std::string& name) : SerialContainer(name) {
54  PropertyMap& p = properties();
55  p.declare<std::string>("eef", "end-effector to grasp with");
56  p.declare<std::string>("object", "object to grasp");
57 }
58 
59 // TODO: Use AttachedBody's detach_posture_ to store the inverse grasping trajectory to re-open the gripper.
60 void SimpleGraspBase::setup(std::unique_ptr<Stage>&& generator, bool forward) {
61  // properties provided by the grasp generator via its Interface or its PropertyMap
62  const std::set<std::string>& grasp_prop_names = { "object", "eef", "pregrasp", "grasp" };
63 
64  // insert children at end / front, i.e. normal or reverse order
65  int insertion_position = forward ? -1 : (generator ? 1 : 0);
66 
67  if (generator) {
68  // forward properties from generator's to IK's solution (bottom -> up)
69  generator->setForwardedProperties(grasp_prop_names);
70  // allow inheritance in top -> down fashion as well
71  generator->properties().configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, { "object", "eef" });
72 
73  auto ik = new ComputeIK("compute ik", std::move(generator));
74  ik->setForwardedProperties(grasp_prop_names); // continue forwarding generator's properties
75 
76  PropertyMap& p = ik->properties();
77  p.declare<std::string>("object");
78  p.configureInitFrom(Stage::INTERFACE, { "target_pose" }); // derived from child's solution
79  p.configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, { "max_ik_solutions", "timeout", "object" }); // derived from parent
80  p.configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT | Stage::INTERFACE, { "eef", "ik_frame" }); // derive from both
81  p.exposeTo(properties(), { "max_ik_solutions", "timeout", "ik_frame" });
82  insert(std::unique_ptr<ComputeIK>(ik), 0); // ComputeIK always goes upfront
83  }
84  {
85  auto allow_touch = new ModifyPlanningScene(forward ? "allow object collision" : "forbid object collision");
86  allow_touch->setForwardedProperties(grasp_prop_names); // continue forwarding generator's properties
87 
88  PropertyMap& p = allow_touch->properties();
89  p.declare<std::string>("eef");
90  p.declare<std::string>("object");
91  p.configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT | Stage::INTERFACE, { "eef", "object" });
92 
93  allow_touch->setCallback([forward](const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, const PropertyMap& p) {
94  collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix& acm = scene->getAllowedCollisionMatrixNonConst();
95  const std::string& eef = p.get<std::string>("eef");
96  const std::string& object = p.get<std::string>("object");
97  acm.setEntry(object, scene->getRobotModel()->getEndEffector(eef)->getLinkModelNamesWithCollisionGeometry(),
98  forward);
99  });
100  insert(std::unique_ptr<ModifyPlanningScene>(allow_touch), insertion_position);
101  }
102  {
103  auto planner = std::make_shared<solvers::JointInterpolationPlanner>();
104  auto move = new MoveTo(forward ? "close gripper" : "open gripper", planner);
105  move->setForwardedProperties(grasp_prop_names); // continue forwarding generator's properties
106 
107  auto group_initializer = [this](const PropertyMap& parent_map) -> boost::any {
108  const std::string& eef = parent_map.get<std::string>("eef");
109  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = model_->getEndEffector(eef);
110  return jmg->getName();
111  };
112  PropertyMap& p = move->properties();
113  p.property("group").configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT | Stage::INTERFACE, group_initializer);
114  p.property("goal").configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT | Stage::INTERFACE, forward ? "grasp" : "pregrasp");
115  p.exposeTo(properties(), { "group", "goal" });
116  insert(std::unique_ptr<MoveTo>(move), insertion_position);
117  }
118  {
119  auto attach = new ModifyPlanningScene(forward ? "attach object" : "detach object");
120  attach->setForwardedProperties(grasp_prop_names); // continue forwarding generator's properties
121 
122  PropertyMap& p = attach->properties();
123  p.declare<std::string>("eef");
124  p.declare<std::string>("object");
125  p.configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT | Stage::INTERFACE, { "eef", "object" });
126 
127  attach->setCallback([forward](const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, const PropertyMap& p) {
128  const std::string& eef = p.get<std::string>("eef");
129  moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject obj;
130  obj.object.operation =
131  forward ? (int8_t)moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD : (int8_t)moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::REMOVE;
132  obj.link_name = scene->getRobotModel()->getEndEffector(eef)->getEndEffectorParentGroup().second;
133  obj.object.id = p.get<std::string>("object");
134  scene->processAttachedCollisionObjectMsg(obj);
135  });
136  insert(std::unique_ptr<ModifyPlanningScene>(attach), insertion_position);
137  }
138 }
139 
140 void SimpleGraspBase::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
141  model_ = robot_model;
142  SerialContainer::init(robot_model);
143 }
144 
145 void SimpleGraspBase::setIKFrame(const Eigen::Isometry3d& pose, const std::string& link) {
146  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_msg;
147  pose_msg.header.frame_id = link;
148  tf::poseEigenToMsg(pose, pose_msg.pose);
149  setIKFrame(pose_msg);
150 }
151 
152 SimpleGrasp::SimpleGrasp(std::unique_ptr<Stage>&& generator, const std::string& name) : SimpleGraspBase(name) {
153  setup(std::move(generator), true);
154 }
155 
156 SimpleUnGrasp::SimpleUnGrasp(std::unique_ptr<Stage>&& generator, const std::string& name) : SimpleGraspBase(name) {
157  setup(std::move(generator), false);
158 }
